mapper.select: SELECT h.`is_publish`, h.`end_time`, h.`id` AS `homeworkId` FROM `edu_program_homework_problem` p, `edu_lesson_class_program_homework` h WHERE p.`id` = #{problemId} AND p.`homework_id` = h.`id`

SELECT h.`id` AS `problemId`, h.`title` AS `title`, h.`num` AS `problemNum`, h.`end_time` AS `endTime`, IFNULL(t.`completeNum`, 0) AS `completeNum` FROM `edu_lesson_class_program_homework` h LEFT JOIN (SELECT `homework_id`, COUNT(*) AS `completeNum` FROM edu_program_homework_stu_answer WHERE `stu_id` = #{stuId} GROUP BY `homework_id`) t ON h.`id` = t.`homework_id` WHERE h.`class_id` = #{classId} AND h.`is_publish` = 1 ORDER BY h.`start_time` DESC
